com.etas.jenkins.plugins.CreateTextFile..textFileContent:
FROM centos:latest
RUN yum install -y wget; yum -y clean all RUN yum install -y which; yum -y clean all RUN wget --no-cookies --no-check-certificate --header "Cookie: gpw_e24=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.oracle.com%2F; oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie" "http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u45-b14/jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm" RUN rpm -ivh jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm RUN rm -rf jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm
RUN wget http://central.maven.org/maven2/org/eclipse/jetty/jetty-distribution/9.3.14.v20161028/jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN tar xf jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN rm -rf jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN mv jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028 /opt/jetty/ RUN useradd -m jetty RUN chown -R jetty:jetty /opt/jetty/
ADD webapps/ /opt/jetty/webapps
EXPOSE 8080
ENTRYPOINT /opt/jetty/bin/jetty.sh start && bash

######### database ########## database.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver database.url=jdbc:mysql://symphonydtalk.c6kifiat6wer.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/dtalk database.username=root database.password=1qaz2wsx
#########database for MIFE################# #database.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver #database.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:6603/symphony-dialog-prd #database.username=symphony_app #database.password=symphony
######### D-App ########## dapp.default.maxDistance=10000 dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats=^((\\+)?94|0)7[76][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.for.signUp =^((\\+)94)7[0125678][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.for.like.comment =^((\\+)?94)7[0125678][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.email.formats=^[_A-Za-z0-9-\\+]+(\\.[_A-Za-z0-9-]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\\.[A-Za-z0-9]+)*(\\.[A-Za-z]{2,})$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.starPoints=^7[76][0-9]{7}$ dapp.sync.accessToken=e39dc94234beb2e05d5c5e9beb339803 dapp.allowed.pin.format=^[0-9]{6}$ dapp.event.count=10 dapp.app.version.android = 1.2 dapp.app.version.ios = 1.2 dapp.app.type.android = ANDROID dapp.app.type.ios = IOS dapp.download.link = www.dialog.lk/d-app-android / www.dialog.lk/d-app-ios dapp.voucher.maximum.voucher.reserved.time = 180 dapp.addToBill.commision = 11
######### webservice - voucher service ########## voucher.service.appId=1 voucher.service.marshaller.contextPath=com.dialog.vouchers voucher.service.defaultUri=http://dapptest.dialog.lk:8080/axis2/services/VoucherService/

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd app /var/lib/jenkins/.sdkman/candidates/gradle/current/bin/gradle clean build cd .. rm -rf webapps/service.war cp app/controller/build/libs/symphony-controller-2.0-SNAPSHOT.war webapps/service.war sudo docker build -t djetty . sudo docker tag djetty:latest 341025277667.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/djetty:latest sudo docker login -u AWS -p  -e none https://341025277667.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com sudo docker push 341025277667.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/djetty:latest
